files.README.md:
# Engineering Skills

Engineering skills for Claude Code.

## Skills

- **web-api-reverse-engineering** - Reverse engineer web pages to discover APIs and produce OpenAPI 3.1 specs using Chrome automation
- **dspy-rb** - Build type-safe LLM applications with DSPy.rb

## Installation

```bash
/plugin marketplace add vicentereig/engineering
/plugin install engineering-skills
```

## License

MIT
